subject: How to run selected Testcases which satisfy a condition in one go
msgSnippet: Is it possible to run some test case of testclasss in one go? For example, say I have10 testcases in MyTest.java class. I want to run say 4 of them which
messageBody:
Is it possible to run some test case of testclasss in one go? For example,
say I have10 testcases in MyTest.java class. I want to run say 4 of them
which contains the keyword say "File" in one go. I know by selecting the 4
of them would work, but it is pain and laborus work.
Thanks
